content:
Yes, Asturias has several professional soccer teams. The most well-known team is Real Sporting de Gijón, which plays in the Spanish second division. The team has a long history and has played in both the Spanish first and second divisions over the years. Their home stadium is the Estadio El Molinón in Gijón, which has a seating capacity of over 30,000.

Another professional soccer team in Asturias is Real Oviedo, which also plays in the Spanish second division. The team was founded in 1926 and has a loyal following of fans. Their home stadium is the Estadio Carlos Tartiere in Oviedo, which can seat over 30,000 spectators.

In addition to these professional teams, there are also several amateur and semi-professional soccer clubs throughout the region, as soccer is a popular sport in Asturias.
